synopsis.text: School ed at the Tokyo University of the Arts, this thought-provoking anime unveils the haunting tale of a young boy who loses his fingers under mysterious circumstances. When his mother's love takes an uncanny turn, the boy's severed digits transform into larvae and detach from his hand. Hidden behind closed doors, the peculiar bond between mother and son unfolds in a clandestine world. As the boy grapples with his new reality, one question lingers: How will he navigate life and grow in the face of such adversity?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
